free: #e Hello!Every one!
#c 大家好。
#e Greetings! Now I talk about the work by men and women in Vedai Rukai.
#c 大家好！現在我要談到魯凱族中男人與女人的工作。
#e Now (I) am going to tell a story about the importance of women and men in Rukai nowadays.
#c (我)現在要談論魯凱族的現代女人和男人的重要性。
#e Rukai people is often being asked by us: Whether we emphasize the man or woman?
#c 魯凱族常被我們問：我們是重視男生，還是女生?
#e And then I am going to tell about what the situation is.
#c 我將要說明這是怎樣的一個情形。
#n ta-ngimiami-ane應該可拆，但語意不合，需確認。
#e (It comes) to Rukai.
#c (我們說到)魯凱族呢。

gloss: 名物化-穿-衣服-重疊-衣服-名物化

free: #e From eating, clothing and doing things,
#c 從吃飯,穿著,做事
#n 這句不是完整句，是Ecliptic Clause.(EC)
#e Their works are different.
#c 他們的工作不一樣。
#e Still, the way of eating is different.
#c 還有吃法也不一樣。
#e When eating, men and women in Rukai must respect men.
#c 魯凱族的男人和女人吃飯一定要尊重男人。
#e The Man must know he takes care of women.
#c 男人必須知道他對女人表示關愛。
#e We need to see the spoon; like this, the handle of the spoon of women is thin and long.
#c 我們要看湯匙；像這個，女人用的湯匙的握柄細又長。
#e You women will eat slowly with the mouth narrowly open.
#c 你們女人吃飯要慢慢的，嘴巴要張得小小的。
#e Do not open the mouth widely.
#c 不要張大嘴巴。
#e You need to be slow, and then the deportment is good.
#c 你要慢，然後儀態是好的。
#e That is not suitable to have the mouth wide open and eat too much.
#c 嘴巴張太大吃太多那是不適合的。
#e This is the spoon used by men.
#c 這個是男生的湯匙。
#e You men will sweat when you work.
#c 像你這樣的男人工作的時候你要流汗。
#e If you do not eat much, will you be strong enough?
#c 如果沒有你吃很多,你會健壯嗎?
#e (We) make the spoon used in eating by men bigger.
#c 我們把男生吃東西的湯匙做得比較大。
#e When eating, it should be known that if you are a woman, (you) should take the small one.
#c 當在吃飯的時候，如果你是女人,你應該拿小的。
#e If you are a man, you should take the big one.
#c 如果你是男人,你應該拿大的。
#e It is very important that the work of men will be exposed under the sun.
#c 很重要的是男人的工作要曬太陽。
#e (you) will have the work of being dare-to-die corps。
#c (你)當敢死隊的工作。
#e What are dare-to-die corps?
#c 什麼叫做敢死隊?
#e Being dare-to-die corps is tiring.
#c 作為敢死隊是很累的。

gloss: 名物化-拿鋤頭耕田-名物化
free: #e basking in the sun, lumbering, plowing with a hoe
#c 要曬太陽, 要砍柴, 要拿鋤頭耕田。
#n usulru 拿鋤頭耕田ralabe 為「砍、劈」的統稱。

gloss: 名物化-動詞化-木頭-名物化

free: #e basking in the sun, lumbering, plowing with a hoe, hunting
#c 曬太陽、砍柴、拿鋤頭耕田、打獵。
#n usulru 拿鋤頭耕田ralabe 為「砍、劈」的統稱。
#e (You should do) basking in the sun, lumbering, plowing with a hoe, hunting, fishing
#c (你要)曬太陽、砍柴、拿鋤頭耕田、打獵、要捕魚。
#n usulru 拿鋤頭耕田ralabe 為「砍、劈」的統稱。
#e (You do) any work to support the family and (you) sweat, and (you) use power.
#c (你做)只要是養家活口的所有工作，然後(你)流汗，而且(你)用力。
#e Still, (you) must carry (things) on the back.
#c 還有，(你)必須背東西。
#n tukudru 背
#e This is the work of men.
#c 這些是男人的工作。

gloss: 名物化-用-重疊-用-名物化
free: #e This is the tool used in the work of men.
#c 這是男人工作要使用的工具。
#e There is a knife.
#c 有刀。
#e This is the knife used by men.
#c 這是男人使用的刀。
#e These are bow and arrow.
#c 這是弓箭。
#e This animal
#c 這動物。
#e (you) hunt this animal.
#c (你)獵取動物。
#e Women not hunt.
#c 這女人不打獵。
#e You men. You let (women) go to the field.
#c 你們這些男人。你讓(女人)去田裡。
#n pangu-dalrane 表示 讓…去田裡
